proposal.name: WEBGL_multiple_render_targets

contributors.contributor: Members of the WebGL working group

features.feature: The new functions and enumerants defined in the ANGLE_multiple_render_targets extension are changed to use the WEBGL prefix and suffix rather than ANGLE. Their semantics and values remain unchanged.

revision.change: Corrected typo in drawBuffersWEBGL. Changed referenced spec version to 1.0 to fix broken link.
